    The SSBSE is the premier international research symposium on Search-based Software Engineering.

    SSBSE'17 will be hosted in Paderborn, Germany, September 09-11.

    The conference will be co-located with FSE'17

    Important Dates
    Feb14: Tutorial Proposals
    Feb28: Tutorials Selected

    Submission
    Mar31: Abstracts
    Apr07: Papers
    May10: Notification
    Jun07: Camera Ready

    Submission
    May21: Short Papers
    May21: Student Papers
    May25: Challenge Track
    Jun04: Notification
    Jun11: Camera Ready

    Registration
    Jun11: Author Registration
    Jul09: Early Registration

    Register Here

    Schedule

    Note: Please bring your laptops for the tutorials.

    Please, check our map for the conference building, lunch and reception.

    Seongmin Lee and Shin Yoo. Hyperheuristic Observation Based Slicing of Guava
